alert.note: Alert for Essex; Middlesex; Norfolk; Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 2:52PM EDT until September 08 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Essex County in northeastern Massachusetts... North central Norfolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Suffolk County in eastern Massachusetts... Middlesex County in northeastern Massachusetts... Northern Plymouth County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 252 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Pepperell to Carlisle to Sherborn, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Boston, Lowell, Cambridge, Quincy, Lynn, Newton, Lawrence, Somerville, Framingham, Haverhill, Waltham, Malden, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Methuen, Arlington, Everett, and Salem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
